i think this must be something pregenesis or something at start up
kurtosis setup to reproduce
```
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: ethereum/client-go:latest
    cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: sigp/lighthouse:latest-unstable
    vc_type: prysm
    vc_image: gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/validator:latest
    count: 2
network_params:
  genesis_delay: 120
  min_validator_withdrawability_delay: 1
  shard_committee_period: 1
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 250
  churn_limit_quotient: 16
additional_services:
  - assertoor
snooper_enabled: false
disable_peer_scoring: true
assertoor_params:
  image: "ethpandaops/assertoor:master"
  run_stability_check: false
  run_block_proposal_check: false
  tests:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor-test/74a5f7c099c9f856bdca2117f6edf6e39e73cab5/assertoor-tests/block-proposal-check.yaml
```
